Text:
omg I wish there was a version of World of Outlaws for the PS2...my late grandfather drove sprint cars for a very long time and won a lot of trophies (I have one from when he passed), I also have an uncle that used to drive sprint cars so these kind of games are in my blood.

Could someone pleeaaase upload "NASCAR Dirt to Daytona" aka "Dirt to Daytona" for the PS2? That's another game that has sprint cars but I can't find it anywhere :(
